original_prompt:
Implement the paper-tracker system according to PLAN.md.

This is a Computer Science paper tracker with AI summarization and daily reports.

Key components to implement:
1. Paper Fetcher (arXiv API client)
2. SQLite database for storing papers
3. AI Summarizer (using Claude Code subprocess)
4. Report Generator (Markdown)
5. CLI interface
6. Tests for all components

Read PLAN.md first, then implement step by step.
Create the full package structure.
Test each component thoroughly before moving to the next.
Do not stop until all components work end-to-end.

IMPORTANT: The summarizer should call Claude Code as a subprocess (using the gt-switcher pattern: source /home/roachbot/gt-switcher/gt.sh && gt g && claude --agent team 5:executor)
